      • doAuthenticate

        public void doAuthenticate(javax.servlet.ServletRequest req,
                  javax.servlet.ServletResponse rsp,
                  javax.servlet.FilterChain chain)
                    throws Exception
        Description copied from class: AuthenticationPlugin
        This method must authenticate the request. Upon a successful authentication, this must call the next filter in the filter chain and set the user principal of the request, or else, upon an error or an authentication failure, throw an exception.
        Specified by:
        doAuthenticate in class AuthenticationPlugin
        Parameters:
        req - the http request
        rsp - the http response
        chain - the servlet filter chain
        Throws:
        Exception - any exception thrown during the authentication, e.g. PriviledgedAccessException

      • getClientConfigurer

        public HttpClientConfigurer getClientConfigurer()
        Specified by:
        getClientConfigurer in interface HttpClientInterceptorPlugin
        Returns:
        Returns an instance of a HttpClientConfigurer to be used for configuring the httpclients for use with SolrJ clients.
